title: Liquid Button
shortDescription: A professional Call-To-Action button with the "WOW" factor
longDescription:
**Liquid Button** is a professional Call-To-Action button for your website. It makes easier for you to engage with your user as they will **LOVE** to play with it. And you get a *plethora* of options to customize it to your like.

Try it for **free**!
author: Francesco Natali

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Pro plan allows much further customization.

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

actiontype.description: When clicked, what do you want it to do?

hrefphonecall.description: On mobile devices, it calls the number you enter here (for landlines remember to include the international country code, e.g. +44). On desktop, it depends on the system and software installed, for example on OSX it opens FaceTime.
hrefphonecall.title: Phone number

hrefskype.description: Insert the Skype username you want to be called.
hrefskype.title: Skype username

mousedist.description: How much the mouse movements affect Liquid Button? (default value = 70)
mousedist.title: Sensitivity

viscosity.description: Increase to slow everything down. Decrease to make it more jelly-like. (default value = 20)
viscosity.title: Viscosity

alignbutton.description: Depending where you are placing Liquid Button, you might want to change this value.
alignbutton.title: Align Button

aligntext.description: If you change Height of the button, you might want to change this value to align your message.
aligntext.title: Align Text

positionbuttonbottom.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (bottom).
positionbuttonbottom.title: Position Button (bottom)

positionbuttonleft.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (left).
positionbuttonleft.title: Position Button (left)

positionbuttonright.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (right).
positionbuttonright.title: Position Button (right)

positionbuttontop.description: Change this value for fine-grained positioning (top).
positionbuttontop.title: Position Button (top)

fontface.description: Leave it blank to let Liquid Button to automatically choose, or force a specific font available on your website by writing its name here.
fontface.title: Name

location.description: Where should it appear on your site?
location.title: Location

message.description: You can insert text and emoji.
message.title: Message

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: Pro plan allows much further customization.
